title: Gold & Silver Spot Daily Forecast - 25 October 2019
text:
Gold & Silver Spot Chart

holding above first support at 1496/98 is an important buy signal targeting 1510 & minor resistance at 1518/19.

Eventually we should beat 1520 for 1523/24 & 1528/29.

Longs need stops below 1493. Failure here risks a slide to 1491/89, perhaps as far as minor support at 1482/81.

bounce from key support at 1755/50 targets 1785/90. A break above here is an important buy signal targeting 1800, 1830/32 & 1855/60.

Longs at 1755/50 need stops below 1735. A break lower risks a slide to 1730 & 1710/00. A break below 1695 targets 1685 & 1680/78.
description: Commodities Analysis by Jason Sen covering: XAU/USD, XAG/USD, Gold Futures, Silver Futures. Read Jason Sen's latest article on Investing.com
